## dbverse

I am the creator and lead developer of  [dbverse](https://github.com/drieslab/dbverse), a metalibrary for large-scale scientific data analysis in a database.

::: {#dbverse-listings}
:::

## ![](./images/GiottoLogo.png){width="8%"} Giotto Suite

I am a core contributor and co-developer of [Giotto Suite](https://github.com/drieslab/Giotto), a modular suite of R packages for multi-scale and multi-omic spatial omics analysis. 

::: {#giotto-listings}
:::
